evolutionmodV2:Lifesteal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to the unblocked damage. NL Exhaust. NL evolutionmod:SuccubusGene2 evolutionmod:Form: you are healed instead.

evolutionmodV2:Battleborn.NAME: Battleborn

evolutionmodV2:ShiftingPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger your first !M! genes. NL evolutionmod:Shift a number of genes equal to your current energy.

evolutionmodV2:ChimeraDefense.NAME: Chimera Defense

evolutionmodV2:Mutate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! genes you don't already have. Channel it and trigger its effect.

evolutionmodV2:CrystalShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL evolutionmod:Randomized evolutionmod:Form: add !M! Block. NL evolutionmod:Randomized evolutionmod:Form: Refund 1. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmodV2:Treasure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an upgraded Crystal Stone, Shard or Dust to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmodV2:CrystalShaping.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a random Crystal Shield, Shard or Dust matching your rightmost genes to your hand.

evolutionmodV2:Mastery.NAME: Gene Mastery
evolutionmodV2:Mastery.DESCRIPTION: When you Channel the [#F04040]Imprinted[] gene or use a matching evolutionmod:Form effect, trigger its effect. NL [#F04040]Imprinted[] evolutionmod:Form: gain an Orb slot

evolutionmodV2:Absorption.NAME: Absorption
evolutionmodV2:Absorption.DESCRIPTION: The first !M! genes you evolutionmod:Adapt or Evoke each turn trigger their effect.

evolutionmodV2:Grow.NAME: Grow
evolutionmodV2:Grow.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. Startup: shuffle a copy of this card in your draw pile.
evolutionmodV2:Grow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb slot. Startup: shuffle !M! copies of this card in your draw pile.

evolutionmodV2:Shrink.NAME: Shrink
evolutionmodV2:Shrink.DESCRIPTION: Evoke ALL genes. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.
evolutionmodV2:Shrink.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke your 2 rightmost genes. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.

evolutionmodV2:Ritual.NAME: Ritual
evolutionmodV2:Ritual.DESCRIPTION: Permanently evolutionmod:Adapt this with your rightmost gene not already adapted. NL Exhaust.
evolutionmodV2:Ritual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Permanently evolutionmod:Adapt this with your rightmost gene not already adapted. NL Ethereal.

evolutionmodV2:GodlyPowers.NAME: Godly Powers
evolutionmodV2:GodlyPowers.DESCRIPTION: Each turn the first !M! evolutionmod:Form that Channel a gene also apply their conditional effect.

evolutionmodV2:HumanForm.NAME: Human Form
evolutionmodV2:HumanForm.DESCRIPTION: Trigger all your genes !M! times and Evoke them. NL When you Channel a gene, trigger it !M! times and Evoke it.

evolutionmodV2:Gene.NAME: Gene
evolutionmodV2:Gene.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel this gene and trigger its effect.

evolutionmodV2:Drone.NAME: Drone
evolutionmodV2:Drone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is in you hand at the end of your turn gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

evolutionmodV2:Feather.NAME: Feather
evolutionmodV2:Feather.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card and discard a card. NL evolutionmod:HarpyGene2 evolutionmod:Form: return a evolutionmod:FeatherStorm from your discard pile to your hand.
evolutionmodV2:Feather.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and discard !M! cards. NL evolutionmod:HarpyGene2 evolutionmod:Form: return a evolutionmod:FeatherStorm from your discard pile to your hand.

mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.NAME: Closing Barrage
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power and [#FF5252]Poise multiplied by !M!.
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X+1 times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power and [#FF5252]Poise multiplied by !M!.
